title: refactor(http): replace default port magic numbers with constants
body:
## Summary
Replace literal port numbers 80 and 443 with named constants.

## Problem
Magic numbers for default HTTP/HTTPS ports:
- Line 833: `80`
- Line 849: `443`
- Line 2567: `80` or `443`
- Lines 2653-2654: port comparisons

Using magic numbers reduces readability and maintainability.

## Location
- File: `src/http/SocketHTTPClient.c`
- Lines: 833, 849, 2567, 2653-2654

## Proposed Solution
Use or add constants in `include/http/SocketHTTP.h`:
```c
#define HTTP_DEFAULT_PORT  80
#define HTTPS_DEFAULT_PORT 443
```

Then replace all literals with these constants.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Constants defined in SocketHTTP.h (if not already)
- [ ] All port literals replaced in SocketHTTPClient.c
- [ ] Other HTTP files checked for same pattern
- [ ] Tests pass with sanitizers
- [ ] ~8 lines clarified

## Labels
refactor, redundancy, http
